title: Mozilla Firefox does not recognize tab and shift-enter with a local goplay -html
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

1. run goplay -html on a local machine
2. connect to http://127.0.0.1:3999/ with Mozilla Firefox (tested with version 4.0)
3. attempt to edit the textarea including <TAB>, or compile via shift-enter

What is the expected output?

The <tab> key moves focus outside of the textarea instead of entering a tab
shift-enter inserts a newline instead of compiling and running

Which operating system are you using?

Mac OS 10.6.7

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

weekly.2010-03-15/weekly

Note that Chrome (10.0...) and Safari 5.0.4 behave correctly, but other Mozilla-based
browsers such as Camino are broken.  

All browsers behave as expected when the "Compile and run after each
keystroke" option is selected.
